messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dawn F.
messages.msgSnippet: If you and I don t agree that s really ok with ... Bravo Dawn!  (Applause!! Cheering  Whistling)  It s nice to see someone unapologetic about their beliefs,
messages.messageBody:
If you and I don't agree that's really ok with
>me. I don't need anyone else's approval of my belief system.

Bravo Dawn! (Applause!! Cheering Whistling) It's nice to see someone unapologetic about their beliefs, while still maintaining maturity and a non-confrontational attitude. I hope that I come off as well as that in how I declare myself, as I feel the same what as you about my beliefs.

Nanci K.
